npc.label: Inverna Nightbreeze (Attacker)
npc.name: Warrior (Attacker) 1
npc.languages: Common, Elvish, plus one of your choice

trait.name: Martial Role: Attacker
trait.text: Inverna gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls.

trait.name: Darkvision
trait.text: Accustomed to twilit forests and the night sky, Inverna have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. She can see in dim light within 60 feet of her as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. She can’t discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
trait.text: Inverna has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep

trait.name: Trance
trait.text: Elves don't need to sleep. Instead,they meditate deeply, remaining semiconscious, for 4 hours a day. (The Common word for such meditation is "trance.") While meditating, Inverna can dream after a fashion; such dreams are actually mental exercises that have become reflexive through years of practice. After resting in this way, she gains the same benefit that a human does from 8 hours of sleep.

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 2 slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

npc.label: Inverna Nightbreeze (Defender)

npc.languages: Common, Elvish, plus one of your choice

npc.name: Warrior (Attacker) 2

action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Protection
reaction.text: Inverna imposes disadvantage on the attack roll of a creature within 5 feet of her whose target isn’t Inverna. Inverna must be able to see the attacker.

npc.label: Inverna Nightbreeze (Attacker)
npc.name: Warrior (Attacker) 9
npc.languages: Common, Elvish, plus one of your choice

trait.name: Indomitable (1/Day)
trait.text: Inverna can reroll a saving throw that she fails but must use the new result.

trait.name: Battle Readiness
trait.text: Inverna has advantage on initiative rolls.

trait.name: Extra Attack
trait.text: Inverna can attack twice, instead of once, whenever she takes the Attack action on her turn.

trait.name: Improved Critical
trait.text: Inverna’s attack rolls now score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the d20.

trait.name: Second Wind
trait.text: Inverna can use a bonus action on her turn to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + her level. If she does so, she can’t use this feature again until she finishes a short or long rest.

trait.name: Martial Role: Attacker
trait.text: Inverna gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls.

trait.name: Darkvision
trait.text: Accustomed to twilit forests and the night sky, Inverna have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. She can see in dim light within 60 feet of her as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. She can’t discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
trait.text: Inverna has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep

trait.name: Trance
trait.text: Elves don't need to sleep. Instead,they meditate deeply, remaining semiconscious, for 4 hours a day. (The Common word for such meditation is "trance.") While meditating, Inverna can dream after a fashion; such dreams are actually mental exercises that have become reflexive through years of practice. After resting in this way, she gains the same benefit that a human does from 8 hours of sleep.

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

trait.text: Accustomed to twilit forests and the night sky, Inverna have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. She can see in dim light within 60 feet of her as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. She can’t discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
trait.text: Inverna has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep

trait.name: Trance
trait.text: Elves don't need to sleep. Instead,they meditate deeply, remaining semiconscious, for 4 hours a day. (The Common word for such meditation is "trance.") While meditating, Inverna can dream after a fashion; such dreams are actually mental exercises that have become reflexive through years of practice. After resting in this way, she gains the same benefit that a human does from 8 hours of sleep.

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 5 slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

npc.label: Inverna Nightbreeze (Defender)
npc.name: Warrior (Defender) 15
npc.languages: Common, Elvish, plus one of your choice

trait.name: Improved Defense
trait.text: Inverna’s AC increases by 1.

trait.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
trait.text: Inverna can reroll a saving throw that she fails but must use the new result.

trait.name: Battle Readiness
trait.text: Inverna has advantage on initiative rolls.

trait.name: Extra Attack
trait.text: Inverna can attack three times, instead of once, whenever she takes the attack action on her turn.

trait.name: Superior Critical
trait.text: Inverna’s attack rolls now score a critical hit on a roll of 18-20 on the d20.

trait.name: Second Wind
trait.text: Inverna can use a bonus action on her turn to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + her level. If she does so, she can’t use this feature again until she finishes a short or long rest.
